committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 8, 1978, through October 14, 1978, as "National School Bus Safety Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week beginning October 8, 1978, as "National Schoolbus Safety Week."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the period from October 8, 1978, through October 14, 1978, as "National School Bus Safety Week".
